Description_lang: The Monkey King was the trusted companion of Shaohao, emperor of all Pandaria. He is mischievous, cunning, and knows untold secrets about Pandaria's past.
AuraDescription_lang: The Monkey King can be unpredictable in battle. His crazy antics usually result in victory.

description_blz.en_US: The Monkey King was the trusted companion of Shaohao, emperor of all Pandaria. He is mischievous, cunning, and knows untold secrets about Pandaria's past.
description_blz.es_MX: El Rey Mono era el fiel compañero de Shaohao, emperador de todo Pandaria. Es travieso, astuto y conoce incontables secretos acerca del pasado de Pandaria.
description_blz.pt_BR: O Rei Macaco era o leal companheiro de Shaohao, imperador de toda a Pandária. Encrenqueiro e astuto, ele conhece segredos nunca revelados sobre o passado de Pandária.
description_blz.de_DE: Der Affenkönig war der zuverlässige Begleiter von Shaohao, Kaiser von ganz Pandaria. Er ist gewitzt und schelmisch und weiß von ungeahnten Geheimnissen aus der Vergangenheit Pandarias.
description_blz.en_GB: The Monkey King was the trusted companion of Shaohao, emperor of all Pandaria. He is mischievous, cunning, and knows untold secrets about Pandaria's past.
description_blz.es_ES: El Rey Mono fue el compañero de confianza de Shaohao, emperador de toda Pandaria. Es travieso y astuto y conoce secretos no revelados acerca del pasado de Pandaria.
description_blz.fr_FR: Le roi-singe était le fidèle compagnon de Shaohao, empereur de toute la Pandarie. Rusé et malicieux, il connaît d’innombrables secrets sur le passé de cette nation légendaire.
description_blz.it_IT: Il Signore delle Scimmie era il fidato compagno di Shaohao, imperatore di Pandaria. È curioso, astuto e conosce segreti indicibili sul passato di Pandaria.
description_blz.ru_RU: Король обезьян был верным спутником Шаохао, императора всей Пандарии. Он хитер, любит проказничать, и ему ведомы бесчисленные тайны прошлого Пандарии.
description_blz.ko_KR: 과거 원숭이 왕은 판다리아 전역을 다스린 샤오하오 황제의 믿음직한 친구였습니다. 그는 짓궂고 교활한 성격으로 판다리아의 역사에 얽힌 비밀을 알고 있습니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 美猴王是紹昊，潘達利亞的帝王信賴的夥伴。他十分淘氣、狡猾，並清楚潘達利亞秘而不宣的過往。
description_blz.zh_CN: 美猴王是潘达利亚的皇帝少昊最信赖的勇士。他的性格精灵古怪，并了解许多关于潘达利亚历史的不传之秘。
